title: Two Owners - 50% Each (Husband and Wife)
input: GRANT DEED from CHARLES D. SHAPIRO AND SUZANNE D. SHAPIRO, HUSBAND AND WIFE AS JOINT TENANTS to CHARLES DAVID SHAPIRO AND SUZANNE DENISE SHAPIRO, AS CO-TRUSTEES OF THE SHAPIRO FAMILY TRUST

buyer_names_component.buyerVesting: AS CO-TRUSTEES OF THE SHAPIRO FAMILY TRUST
AS CO-TRUSTEES OF THE SHAPIRO FAMILY TRUST

oldOwners.titleType: HUSBAND AND WIFE AS JOINT TENANTS
HUSBAND AND WIFE AS JOINT TENANTS

explanation: Two owners split ownership 50/50. The word 'AND' between names ALWAYS means separate people. Must create TWO separate entries.
